blogPost.excerpt: Make your company Apple-friendly with LiveChat integrated with Apple Business Chat. Thanks to it, customers can contact you through Messages chat button integrated in multiple iOS apps like Apple Maps, Siri and more.
blogPost.body: Make your company Apple-friendly with LiveChat integrated with Apple Business Chat. Thanks to it, customers can contact you through Messages chat button integrated in multiple iOS apps like Apple Maps, Siri and more.
blogPost.title: Apple Business Chat for LiveChat - Offer great customer experience on Apple devices
blogPost.author: Agnieszka

localize.description: 通过与 Apple Business Chat 集成的 LiveChat，让你的公司对苹果友好。有了它，客户可以通过集成在苹果地图、Siri等多个iOS应用中的信息聊天按钮与你联系。
localize.tagline: 在苹果设备上提供良好的客户体验

localize.description: 通過與 Apple Business Chat 集成的 LiveChat，讓你的公司對蘋果友好。有了它，客戶可以通過集成在蘋果地圖、Siri等多個iOS應用中的信息聊天按鈕與你聯繫。
localize.tagline: 在蘋果設備上提供良好的客戶體驗

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 12% over the past week, the 59th consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 72% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/mJGOeBXmHX

localize.full_text: 过去一周，美国的科维德-19住院人数下降了12%，这是连续第59天周环比下降。比1月6日的峰值下降了72%。🙏 https://t.co/mJGOeBXmHX。
過去一週，美國的科維德-19住院人數下降了12%，這是連續第59天周環比下降。比1月6日的峯值下降了72%。🙏 https://t.co/mJGOeBXmHX。

next.title: The Kilobyte's Gambit - Try beating 1024 bytes of Javascript
